content.p:
ยง 52. Reports. On or before February first, nineteen hundred
eighty-nine and on or before February first of each year thereafter in
which contracts under this article are in force, the commissioner shall
submit to the governor, the temporary president of the senate and the
speaker of the assembly a report detailing progress and evaluating
results, to date, of the program. Such report shall include, but not be
limited to a review of the basis for selection of eligible applicants;
the number of persons served; a review of the efforts made to prevent
homelessness and to provide permanent housing for homeless households,
including a list of the number of persons and families, by project, who
received services; an identification of the estimated savings and costs
of the program to the state and localities; and an evaluation of
continuing needs for homelessness intervention services.
